lyrics.stanza: Worldly affairs encumbered me; till the Lord said, "Come, follow Me!" I was exhausted, faltering; still He called and would not leave me be; At once, when I responded: "Yes!", He shined His glad'ning ray! Glory, rest, shouts of praise fill all my days as I follow on His way.

No man can serve two masters, from God and the world seek reward, Whether 'tis spent or whether reserved, ointment can but once be outpoured; Lord, You’re my only one true love, I'd ne'er repent nor swerve. Lord, You alone are worthy of all my life and all my love.
